data.name: DARK FABLE
data.detailed_description:
Five unique islands, valleys, magical forests and glassy seas, on each of which unfolds and epic battle with a sorceress. Defeat four bright sorceresses, free your friends and crush Tir-na-Tog, avenge the evil desecration of your father's house. With the help of the magic board, you can make raids on the shaky islands without any harm to yourself, and after a successful siege, take the sorceress captive, turning her into a servant and locking her away in a castle.
Storyline: The bright sorceresses found the house of “Little Evil” and remade it to their liking, turning it into a magical garden. The Little Evil saved the house steward, and for 33 years the Evil grew stronger, dreaming of revenge. Now, having become a true dark lord, the Evil has found its offenders and it is your objective is to aid him in his quest for vengeance.
Game Features:
The game is a magical duel, by functionality similar to Air Hockey.
Charming locations where battles take place.
The castle of the ruler grows with each victory, each defeated sorceress is given a separate room.
Each sorceress has her own skills, as well as her own roles once she is locked away in the castle.
To win, you have to defeat the four sorceresses and their princess.
Each character has a unique style of play.
After two victories, each island is besieged by the dark lord, displaying a unique defense system.
Each sorceress has her own revenge scenario (͡ ° ͜ʖ ͡ °)

data.short_description: Five unique islands, valleys, magical forests and glassy seas, on each of which unfolds and epic battle with a sorceress. Defeat four bright sorceresses, free your friends and crush Tir-na-Nog, avenge the evil desecration of your father's house.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Russian*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 5 512Vram
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 850 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Don`t use your audio stream settings above 96 kHz for this game.
  • Additional Notes: min 512 mb Vram on laptops with an integrated video card, there may be difficulties with game running
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN10
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 10
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 850 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Don`t use your audio stream settings above 96 kHz for this game.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or for viewing at work: nudity or sexual scenes, adult content
